landing.heroTitle: Build Your Professional Resume in Minutes
landing.heroSubtitle: Our intuitive interface and curated templates make job hunting easy.

heroDescription: Our intuitive interface and curated templates make job hunting easy.
whyChooseDesc: Discover the features that make ResumePath the perfect choice for your resume building needs.
featureFastDesc: Create professional resumes in under 5 minutes with our streamlined process.
featureTemplatesDesc: Choose from a variety of professionally designed templates for any industry.
featureExportDesc: Download your resume in multiple formats including PDF, Word, and more.
finalCTADesc: Join thousands of professionals who have already created their perfect resume with ResumePath.

dashboard.noDocumentsText: You haven't created any profiles yet. Start building your professional trade portfolio to land your next opportunity.
dashboard.deleteDocumentText: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.

freeDesc: Basic features for getting started with your resume.
upgradeDesc: Enhanced features to improve your resume quality.
masterDesc: Premium features for professional resume building.
